segments.text: This scene in the kitchen is heartbreaking to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is diligently drying dishes, oblivious to the disaster unfolding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the sink is flooding the floor, and she's standing right in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the cold water soaking her shoes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are climbing dangerously on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, he could fall and hurt himself badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl looks so eager, not realizing the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're stealing cookies, but it's the danger that worries me most.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a nice garden, but inside it's all wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone paying attention to what's happening?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears, I just know it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Poor family, they deserve better than this neglect.
segments.speaker: PAR
